addr: 1050 S Hill St Los Angeles, CA 90015
title: Love&Lust NAUGHTY OR NICE BALL Costume Dance Party 2015. + Snow-Party (18+)
desc: He's checking it once... He's checking it twice, but only you know if your coming out to be Naughty or Nice! The Grinch took over the Belasco Theater once again and challenged Santa with 2-Rooms of Dance music (EDM vs. INDUSTRIAL) Dance under the falling flakes of mulitple snow machines as you kiss your love ones under our mistle-toe photobooth complete with full size Santa-Sleigh custom modified with a dancer pole. Forget the eggnog! throw-back some of our colorful Holiday Drink Cocktails as you gaze apon the Love & Lust North Pole stage where dozens of Sexy Elves, Santas & Reindeer play hoping to find thier way onto the Naughty list this year!
